alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Northern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 22 at 3:05PM CDT until March 23 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTRY MIX OF FREEZING RAIN, SLEET AND SNOW EXPECTED TONIGHT INTO WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. Ice accumulations of one to two tenths of an inch possible. * WHERE...Langlade and Northern Oconto County Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 1 PM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
